title: I log in my account, It tells me to make a Summoner Name, I go in my account and its LVL 1!!!!!!!!!
body:
I have spent alot of money on league of legends,and my account had alot of stuff.
When i went to log in it told me to make a summoner name ????? Why is it telling me that!
I make my old name and it puts me in at LVL 1 with NOTHING. 
I have a highly active account and now when i log in i see a different account,..

replies.body:
You may have logged in a different account or region so check of its Oce if it is then comment this to riot support and they will restore your stuff

Here     https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/signin?return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.riotgames.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us%2Frequests%2F22759705
Same thing happend to me, only I haven't yet put in a new summoner name in fear of losing my progress and purchased skins/champs :/ what do I do?

You may be logging into the wrong account. Try our [username recovery page](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/forgot-username) to see if this resolves your issue.

Let me know what happened.
I assume that you are a rioter. I really need help because someone is trying to hack me! Please check my post!
Sorry, can't help you with this one! ;(

Hey,

Are you sure you tried to log in on the right region/account? Doublecheck this, might help a lot :)
